title: Sentinelone Threats
description:
The OpenCTI SentinelOne Threats connector can be used to import Artifacts from BinaryVault.For more information about BinaryVault and the steps to set it up, see:https://success.alienvault.com/s/article/UUID-9bf40076-0ba9-2f93-93bd-b4878bd6c220
Note: API tokens expire every 6 months for SentinelOne. In order for this connectorto continue functioning, you must re-generate a token before this expiration date,and replace it in the configuration.
short_description:
The OpenCTI SentinelOne Threats connector can be used to import Artifacts from BinaryVault.For more information about BinaryVault and the steps to set it up, see:https://success.alienvault.com/s/article/UUID-9bf40076-0ba9-2f93-93bd-b4878bd6c220
Note: API tokens expire every 6 months for SentinelOne. In order for this connectorto continue functioning, you must re-generate a token before this expiration date,and replace it in the configuration.
